Name: Buffet Knight
About the game: Description Oh No! The Demon Chef has stolen the treasured ingredients from Gourmet Town and has hoarded them back in his castle. Sounds like this is a worthy quest for Buffet Knight, our gluttonous hero with a big appetite! Embark on a journey as Buffet Knight in this short action/adventure game to bring peace back to the Gustation Kingdom. Gobble up almost everything, spit them out to defeat your foes, and grow bigger as your eating power increases. Will feasting on all this delicious food ever fulfill Buffet Knight’s dream of savoring the fabled “Ultimate Flavour”? What will happen when Buffet Knight succumbs to his desires and allows his appetite to grow too big? Features: A short action/adventure game with cute pixel art. Three bosses to overcome, two endings to unlock. Plenty of things to eat… but is it ever enough? Keyboard Controls: Movement - Arrow keys Select / Interact - Z Cancel - X Menu - Esc Inhale / Shoot - Space Swallow - X Basic Controller Support: Movement - Directional Buttons Select / Interact - A Cancel - B Menu - Y Inhale / Shoot - X Swallow - B
